system.descriptionText: Can make +20 Pilot (Personal) Test to make safe guided fall from any height or short jump over terrain or foes and land at the end of movement. Can make +0 Pilot Personal Test as Half Action to gain Flyer (12) for one minute or 1d5+10 Rounds.

description.value: Can make +20 Pilot (Personal) Test to make safe guided fall from any height or short jump over terrain or foes and land at the end of movement. Can make +0 Pilot Personal Test as Half Action to gain Flyer (12) for one minute or 1d5+10 Rounds.
